toc.envision_location: Eiffel ENViSioN!\Developing with Eiffel ENViSioN!\Adding a New Project\Advanced GUI Project Wizard\Interface Construction Page\How To's

paragraph.paragraph:
To reparent an
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object , you need to
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#pick_and_drop pick the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object and
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#pick_and_drop drop it on the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object you wish it to be parented in. The
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object will be removed from its current parent, and inserted in the new parent at the next available position.

When an
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object is inserted into a parent, it is always added at the next available position. If you wish to place an
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object at a particular position within a parent, you must hold down the Shift key, and drop on an
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object already contained in parent, Your
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object will then be inserted in the parent, in the position preceding the child
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object that you dropped on.

You can access
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object objects from both the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/60_builder_window/index builder window and
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/20_layout_constructor/index layout constructor .

For more information about an
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object objects capacity and permitted children, see the
/libraries/vision2/00_introduction.html EiffelVision2 documentation.
